interestingcomments.content:
Making a custom desktop /!/ Hi there!

My girlfriend and I will move in to our new house next week, and we've decided we want to make our own desktop (dimensions: 2,80m x 88 cm) from spruce wood. The wood we'll be using are 33 x 220 x 4200 mm planks.

But, since we would like an alternating pattern, I've made a sketch up in Excel.

https://preview.redd.it/l0mldun057w71.png?width=1138&format=png&auto=webp&s=53688ae34df701d4744207760a7a08458572885a

I've got some woodworking experience, but would like to know if this would work out using only glue and no biscuits/dowels/dominos) because I don't have the tools for this. I've searched on YouTube but cannot seem to find a similar desktop.

Hope you guys/gals can help me with this!
